## Rune.rawDescription property

The raw description (short version) provided by Data Dragon. This contains some HTML-like tags that help to display it on webpages.

See [description](./shieldbow.rune.description.md) to view the description with all the HTML-like tags stripped out.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
get rawDescription(): string;
```
